vote.title: To authorize the Director of Public Service to enter into contract with Strawser Paving Company for the Pedestrian Safety Improvements - Maple Canyon Avenue Sidewalks project; to authorize the expenditure of up to $1,624,446.20 from the Streets and Highways Bond Fund for the Project; and to declare an emergency. ($1,624,446.20)
vote.description: A motion was made by Lourdes Barroso De Padilla, seconded by Shayla Favor, that this Ordinance be Approved. The motion carried by the following vote:
